text: The Federation of Genealogical Societies is a non-profit organization and consortium of Genealogy Societies. Its headquarters are located in Austin, Texas in the United States. It works with genealogy organizations around the world. == Other websites == * Federation of Genealogical Societies * FGS Blog * FGS 2011 Conference, September 7-10, 2011 * FGS Society Hall Category:Austin, Texas Category:Non-profit organizations of the United States Category:Genealogy
title: Federation of Genealogical Societies
